first_convo: Hi Honey! I see you have the next gem! Amazing job!

Here's where it gets tricky though. Do you remember the family who live in the house past the north-east forest?
I think they knew something about gems, but I havent seen any of them since the spell broke! Can you go check on them?
The forest used to be beautiful, but I haven't been there since the spell broke. I've heard rumors of bad things, so be careful!
Once the family help you with the gem, we can figure out where the last one is.
